short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Anexas is one stop solution for training, consultancy, and certification

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Anexas Certification offers the easy way to enroll in courses, access the study material and manage a dashboard in your hand. Get notified of all the upcoming free workshops, top selling popular courses and corporate training and consulting. 

Anexas provides training, consulting and certification for 16 years in 30+ courses, certifying more than 150,000 participants and serving 500+ clients with 5000+ projects. 

Course we offer-
✅Lean Six Sigma White Belt
✅Lean Six Sigma Yellow Belt
✅Lean Six Sigma Green Belt
✅Lean Six Sigma Black Belt
✅Lean Six Sigma Master Black Belt
✅Project Management Professional
✅Certified Professional in Healthcare Quality (CPHQ)
✅Data Science Basic Course
✅Data Science Intermediate Course
✅Data Science Advanced Course
✅Power BI
✅Total Quality Management
✅Soft Skills

Corporate Training and Consulting we offer-
✅Customer Service Excellence
✅GDPR
✅Lean
✅FMEA
✅Entrepreneurial Mindset
✅7QC Tools
✅Business Process
✅5S 
✅Balanced Scorecard

Who is your trainer?
✅Certified trainers with more than 32 years of experience. 
✅Industry experts working in major domains. 
✅Published research paper at the National Library of Medicine.
✅Serving as Senior Data Scientist, PMPs, LSS professionals and more. 
✅7 years of experience in Data Science, Machine Learning, Deep Learning & Application Development.
✅Contributed to 46+ Patents for different countries (US, China, Europe).
✅Currently a mentor at the University of Texas at Austin.

Group Companies- 
✅Anexas Denmark and Anexas Europe incorporated in Denmark
✅Anexas Consultancy Se. Pvt. Ltd incorporated in India
✅Anexas FZE incorporated in UAE
✅Anexas Middle East in Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, Oman, Qatar and Bahrain
✅Datamitum
✅Anexas Clinics
